Music

Last updated on November 2, 2022

I like music: playing it, writing it, and listening to it.

What I listen to

For years now I‚Äôve been using various methods to collect data on the music I play. Most of this data is stored in my LastFM account. There was a time between 2008 and 2018 when I had varying ideas on online privacy, which has created a huge gap in my listening history. I continue to regret this.
